content.description: In a certain prairie community, a dominant prairie grass species has recently been infected with a virus that disrupts one of the electron transport proteins in the chloroplasts of infected cells.
content.question: Describe and explain the most likely effects on individual infected plants.

frqParts.text: Describe and explain the most likely effects on individual infected plants.

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
